pkgmetadata.longdescription: Efficient Constrained Based Modelling in R // This Systems Biology Library for R implements algorithms for constraint based analyses of metabolic networks (e.g. flux-balance analysis (FBA), minimization of metabolic adjustment (MOMA), regulatory on/off minimization (ROOM), robustness analysis and flux variability analysis). Most of the current LP/MILP solvers are supported via additional packages.
